title: Customer Experience Practical Skills Enhancement: Knowledge Network-Based Concept Change Strategy: Network Science Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and analyze their existing knowledge networks using concept mapping tools.
Learners can measure relationships between concepts using network science metrics (e.g., centrality, connection strength).
Learners can design structural changes to knowledge networks and develop implementation plans through social problem-solving projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
